content.text: Match ends, Hull City 0, Southampton 1.
Second Half ends, Hull City 0, Southampton 1.
Substitution, Southampton. Victor Wanyama replaces Steven Davis.
George Boyd (Hull City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Dangerous play by Guly do Prado (Southampton).
Jack Cork (Southampton) hits the bar with a right footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by James Ward-Prowse.
Attempt saved. Sone Aluko (Hull City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Shane Long.
Attempt missed. Nikica Jelavic (Hull City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Sone Aluko.
Substitution, Southampton. James Ward-Prowse replaces Adam Lallana.
Attempt blocked. Guly do Prado (Southampton) right footed shot from very close range is blocked.
Attempt saved. Luke Shaw (Southampton) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Adam Lallana.
Offside, Hull City. Curtis Davies tries a through ball, but Ahmed El Mohamady is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Sone Aluko (Hull City) left footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick.
Morgan Schneiderlin (Southampton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Sone Aluko (Hull City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Morgan Schneiderlin (Southampton).
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Ahmed El Mohamady (Hull City) because of an injury.
Luke Shaw (Southampton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ahmed El Mohamady (Hull City).
Foul by Morgan Schneiderlin (Southampton).
Sone Aluko (Hull City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Southampton. Guly do Prado replaces Rickie Lambert.
Substitution, Hull City. Robbie Brady replaces Maynor Figueroa.
Substitution, Hull City. Sone Aluko replaces David Meyler.
Foul by Morgan Schneiderlin (Southampton).
David Meyler (Hull City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Goal!  Hull City 0, Southampton 1. José Fonte (Southampton) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the centre of the goal following a corner.
Attempt saved. Adam Lallana (Southampton) left footed shot from very close range is saved in the centre of the goal.
Attempt saved. José Fonte (Southampton) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Calum Chambers with a cross.
Corner,  Southampton. Conceded by Maynor Figueroa.
Attempt missed. Maynor Figueroa (Hull City) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Tom Huddlestone.
Morgan Schneiderlin (Southampton) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by David Meyler (Hull City).
Offside, Southampton. Adam Lallana tries a through ball, but Jay Rodriguez is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Rickie Lambert (Southampton) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Steven Davis.
Attempt blocked. Rickie Lambert (Southampton) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Adam Lallana with a headed pass.
Attempt missed. Jay Rodriguez (Southampton) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right.
Attempt missed. Jay Rodriguez (Southampton) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Calum Chambers with a cross.
Attempt saved. Nikica Jelavic (Hull City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top left corner.
José Fonte (Southampton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
George Boyd (Hull City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by José Fonte (Southampton).
Second Half begins Hull City 0, Southampton 0.
First Half ends, Hull City 0, Southampton 0.
